meanings.sent1: The small dog felt wimpy when faced with the big cat.
meanings.sent2: He always avoided confrontations because he was wimpy.
meanings.sent3: The wimpy mouse was too scared to even squeak.
meanings.sent4: Her wimpy attempts at lifting weights were comical.
meanings.sent5: The wimpy candle flame flickered in the gentle breeze.

meanings.sent1: The wimpy kitten hid behind the couch during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: His wimpy excuse for not attending the party was unconvincing.
meanings.sent3: The wimpy rabbit refused to come out of its burrow.
meanings.sent4: Her wimpy voice barely carried across the room.
meanings.sent5: The wimpy flower wilted at the first sign of frost.

meanings.sent1: The wimpy child clung to their parent's leg in the unfamiliar store.
meanings.sent2: She felt wimpy whenever she had to speak in front of a crowd.
meanings.sent3: The wimpy ghost costume made everyone laugh at the Halloween party.
meanings.sent4: His wimpy reaction to horror movies was always entertaining.
meanings.sent5: The wimpy squirrel scampered away at the sound of a twig snapping.
